did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Exterior photographs of the Dinsmoor Company building.

bioghist.p: The George W. Dinsmoor Company manufactured textile boards and paper tubes. It was still in operation in 1968.

scopecontent.p: Five views of the exterior of the George W. Dinsmoor Company building. The building originally housed Walworth Bros. Inc., a worsted manufacturer that was liquidated in February 1930.
All photographs by Richard Garber, Andover, Massachusetts, taken in July of 1968.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: George W. Dinsmoor Company Photographs #6662 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Item 1: Chimney of the George W. Dinsmoor Company, Lawrence, Mass.

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, July 1968. Image depicts the chimney of the George W. Dinsmoor Company in Lawrence, Mass.; this would be at the rear of the complex. Railroad tracks in the foreground; mill buildings and chimneys visible behind the company. See itme 5 for another view of this chimney. 20.5 x 25.25 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 2: George W. Dinsmoor Company, Lawrence, Mass.

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, July 1968. Image depicts George W. Dinsmoor Company in Lawrence, Mass., seen from the front as well as a view down the alley to the right. Cars parked in front of the building. Building is two-story brick, with one-story office area in front. 25.25 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Close-up view of corner of George W. Dinsmoor Company building, Lawrence, Mass.

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, July 1968. Image depicts a corner of the George W. Dinsmoor Company building in Lawrence, Mass., showing the corner office and a view down the alley to the right. See item 2 for a wider-angle shot. 25.25 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 4: Loading dock and side view of George W. Dinsmoor Company, Lawrence, Mass.

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, July 1968. Image depicts a view of the loading dock and the side of the George W. Dinsmoor Company in Lawrence, Mass. Cars parked in side yard. Building is two-story brick, with one-story office area attached in front. 25.25 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 5: Chimney of the George W. Dinsmoor Company, Lawrence, Mass.

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, July 1968. Image depicts the chimney of the George W. Dinsmoor Company in Lawrence, Mass.; this would be at the rear of the complex. Railroad tracks in the foreground; some mill buildings visible in the right background. See item 1 for another view of this chimney. 25.25 x 20.5 cm.
